content.question: What does Ms. Kawamura say about the students in her school?

choices.label: Most of them participate in sports.
Most of them take the school bus.
They like participating in exchange programs.

content.answer: Most of them participate in sports.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
